Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Ds-defensin (D. silvarum defensin, UCSS1a; 3S=S, natural AMPs; hard ticks, arachnids, Chelicerata, arthropods, invertebrates, animals)
Sequence Information.Source: more expressed in salivary gland, carcass,

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (42.11%) toPle-ACC: 18%; K: 15%; G: 12%. GRAVY: 0.035; mol wt: 3502.196; mol formula: C146H247N41O45S6; mol ex coeff: 1865. Another different defensin, also called Ds-defensin, was previously reported in 2015 (see AP2592).Activity: active against Gram+ S. aureus ATCC25923 (MIC 50 uM), S. carnosus (MIC 25 uM), E-faecalis (MIC>50 uM), Gram- E-coli ATCC25922 (MIC > 50 uM), P. faecalis (MIC 25 uM), and fungi C-albicans ATCC10231 (MIC > 50 uM) and C-neoformans (MIC> 50 uM). Also showed potent antioxidant activity.
Literature Information.Author: Li F, Gao Z, Wang K, Zhao Y, Wang H, Zhao M, Zhao Y, Bai L, Yu Z, Yang X. 2021
Literature Information.Title: A novel defensin-like peptide contributing to antimicrobial and antioxidant capacity of the tick Dermacentor silvarum (Acari: Ixodidae).
